mapper.insert:
insert into transaction_history (transaction_fee_id, account_id, flag, money, to_name, account_num, to_bank_code, created_at, location, hs_money, atm_code) values
( #{his.accountId}, #{his.transactionFeeId}, #{his.flag}, #{his.money}, #{his.toName}, #{his.accountNum}, #{his.toBankCode}, #{his.createdAt}, #{his.location}, #{his.hsMoney}, #{his.atmCode} )
